summary: Orchestrates the scanning of Docker images to detect security vulnerabilities and license compliance issues, handling image reference extraction, invoking Bridgecrew's image scanner (with optional TwistCLI support), caching results, applying ignore rules, and consolidating findings into Checkov's reporting format.
